=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: IIP data to FOMC minutes: Top five triggers for Indian stock market this week
Source: LiveMint - Markets
Published: 2025-12-28 02:53
Related Stocks: General Market News
Categories: markets

Summary:
Top five stock market triggers next week: India's IIP data, FOMC minutes, Rupee outlook, gold and silver prices and FII Activity are the top five triggers for the Indian stock market.

Sentiment: neutral
